snippet: Thirty-four years ago, I lived through the Iranian Revolution. I never dreamed I would find myself obliged to return to a country in the Middle East in a state of revolution or, at the least, facing an uprising.
abstract: Thirty-four years ago, I lived through the Iranian Revolution. I never dreamed I would find myself obliged to return to a country in the Middle East in a state of revolution or, at the least, facing an uprising.

headline.main: A Reporter, in Iran in 1978, Will Cover F1 in Bahrain in 2012
